mapper.select: select ifnull(SUM(puHi_Monetary),0) as AllPaypuHi_Monetary, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_ChargeType = 1),0) as aliPayPu_Monetary, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_ChargeType = 2),0) as weChatPu_Monetary, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_ChargeType = 3),0) as unionpayPu_Monetary, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_ChargeType = 4),0) as chargeCardPu_Monetary, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_ChargeType = 5),0) as TransferAccount_Monetary, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_ChargeType = 6),0) as activity_Monetary from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_Type=4

select ifnull(SUM(norm_account_balance),0) as All_normal_account
from tbl_user_normal

select ifnull(SUM(puHi_Monetary),0) as AllConsume, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_Type =1),0) as chargeConsume, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_Type =2),0) as orderConsume, ifnull((select sum(puHi_Monetary) from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_Type =3),0) as shopConsume from tbl_purchasehistory where puHi_Type!=4

select count(*) FROM (select a.user_account,b.user_id,b.norm_real_name,b.norm_name from tbl_user a,tbl_user_normal b where a.user_id=b.user_id ) AS u where 1=1
and u.user_account like CONCAT('%','${usIn_Phone}','%' )
